numlitem.para: Aileron trim system is verified centered.

placard.para: Placard trim switches on aft electronic control panel (P8) "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Verify trim centered with control wheel indications.

numlitem.para: If Aileron Trim is centered and Aileron Trim Actuator will hold the centered position. Open and Collar Aileron Trim Actuator circuit breaker.
If the Aileron Trim Actuator cannot be centered, an Aileron Trim Actuator Dummy Link Part No. A27088-1, may be installed as follows.

warning.para: DOOR LOCKS MUST BE PROPERLY INSTALLED PRIOR TO ACCESS TO LATERAL FEEL, CENTERING, AND TRIM MECHANISM. RAPID ACTION OF DOORS MAY INJURE PERSONNEL OR DAMAGE EQUIPMENT IF LOCKS ARE NOT PROPERLY INSTALLED.

numlitem.para: Remove aileron trim actuator (Ref. Maintenance Manual 27-11-08).
Align rig pin holes A-6 and install rigging pin.
Install Aileron Trim Actuator Dummy Link Part No. 27088-1 or equivalent.
Remove rigging pin from rig pin holes A-6.
